dict.acceptation: 用…替换，把…换成，掉换（过来）；

sent.orig: What is the difference between a foreign exchange swap and a currency swap?
sent.trans: 外汇市场与货币交换有什么区别吗？

sent.orig: This article discusses two methods of confirming stock-swap ratio stock-swap deal.
sent.trans: 探讨股票并购交易中确定换股比率的两种主要方法。

sent.orig: And while Wife Swap was pure voyeurism, Boss Swap hints at some real issues.
sent.trans: 《换妻》纯粹反映了一种偷窥心理，而《互换老板》则影射了一些真实的问题。

sent.orig: The credit default swap pricing model is the core of the credit default swap research.
sent.trans: 构建有效的信用违约互换定价模型，是信用违约互换研究的核心。

sent.orig: In another minute Kalou was a straight swap for Wright-Phillips.
sent.trans: 之后卡卢也换下了赖特菲利普斯。
